24 inline TA::TiledRange prepend_dim_to_trange(
25  std::size_t array_rank, const TiledArray::TiledRange& array_trange,
26  std::size_t block_size = 1) {
28  TA::TiledRange1 new_trange1;
29  {
30  std::vector<std::size_t> new_trange1_v;
31  auto range_size = array_rank;
32  new_trange1_v.push_back(0);
33  for (decltype(range_size) i = block_size; i < range_size; i += block_size) {
34  new_trange1_v.push_back(i);
35  }
36  new_trange1_v.push_back(range_size);
37  new_trange1 = TA::TiledRange1(new_trange1_v.begin(), new_trange1_v.end());
38  }
39 
41  TA::TiledRange new_trange;
42  {
43  auto old_trange1s = array_trange.data();
44  old_trange1s.insert(old_trange1s.begin(), new_trange1);
45  new_trange = TA::TiledRange(old_trange1s.begin(), old_trange1s.end());
46  }
47 
48  return new_trange;
49 }
50 
70 template <typename Tile>
71 TA::SparseShape<float> fuse_vector_of_shapes_tiles(
72  madness::World& global_world,
73  const std::vector<TA::DistArray<Tile, TA::SparsePolicy>>& arrays,
74  const std::size_t array_rank, const TA::TiledRange& fused_trange) {
75  if (arrays.size() == 0) {
76  TA::Tensor<float> fused_tile_norms(fused_trange.tiles_range(), 0.f);
77  return TA::SparseShape<float>(global_world, fused_tile_norms, fused_trange,
78  true);
79  }
80  const std::size_t rank = global_world.rank();
81  auto size = global_world.size();
82  auto first_tile_in_mode0 = *fused_trange.dim(0).begin();
83  const auto block_size =
84  first_tile_in_mode0.second - first_tile_in_mode0.first;
85 
86  std::size_t ntiles_per_array = arrays[0].trange().tiles_range().volume();
87  // precompute tile volumes for later repeated use
88  std::vector<size_t> tile_volumes(ntiles_per_array);
89  {
90  const auto& tiles_range = arrays[0].trange().tiles_range();
91  for (auto&& tile_idx : tiles_range) {
92  const auto tile_ord = tiles_range.ordinal(tile_idx);
93  tile_volumes[tile_ord] =
94  arrays[0].trange().make_tile_range(tile_idx).volume();
95  }
96  }
97 
98  TA::Tensor<float> fused_tile_norms(
99  fused_trange.tiles_range(), 0.f); // use nonzeroes for local tiles only
100 
101  // compute norms of fused tiles
102  // N.B. tile norms are stored in scaled format, unscale in order to compute
103  // norms of fused tiles
104  std::size_t narrays = array_rank;
105  size_t fused_tile_ord = 0;
106  auto element_offset_in_owner = 0;
107  for (size_t vidx = 0, fused_vidx = 0; vidx < narrays;
108  vidx += block_size, ++fused_vidx) {
109  bool have_rank = (rank == fused_vidx % size);
110  // how many arrays actually constribute to this fused tile ... last fused
111  // tile may have fewer than block_size
112  const auto vblk_size =
113  (narrays - vidx) >= block_size ? block_size : narrays - vidx;
114  for (size_t tile_ord = 0; tile_ord != ntiles_per_array;
115  ++tile_ord, ++fused_tile_ord) {
116  if (have_rank) {
117  auto array_ptr = arrays.begin() + element_offset_in_owner * vblk_size;
118  float unscaled_fused_tile_norm2 = 0;
119  const auto tile_volume = tile_volumes[tile_ord];
120  for (size_t v = 0, vv = vidx; v != vblk_size; ++v, ++vv) {
121  const auto unscaled_tile_norm =
122  (*(array_ptr)).shape().data()[tile_ord] * tile_volume;
123  unscaled_fused_tile_norm2 += unscaled_tile_norm * unscaled_tile_norm;
124  ++array_ptr;
125  }
126  const auto fused_tile_volume = tile_volume * vblk_size;
127  const auto fused_tile_norm =
128  std::sqrt(unscaled_fused_tile_norm2) / fused_tile_volume;
129 
130  *(fused_tile_norms.data() + fused_tile_ord) = fused_tile_norm;
131  }
132  }
133  element_offset_in_owner =
134  have_rank ? element_offset_in_owner + 1 : element_offset_in_owner;
135  }
136 
137  auto fused_shapes = TA::SparseShape<float>(global_world, fused_tile_norms,
138  fused_trange, true);
139 
140  return fused_shapes;
141 }
142 
157 template <typename Tile>
158 TA::DenseShape fuse_vector_of_shapes_tiles(
159  madness::World&,
160  const std::vector<TA::DistArray<Tile, TA::DensePolicy>>& arrays,
161  const std::size_t array_rank, const TA::TiledRange& fused_trange) {
162  return TA::DenseShape(1, fused_trange);
163 }

178 // TODO rename to tilewise_slice_of_fused_shape
179 inline TA::SparseShape<float> subshape_from_fused_tile(
180  const TA::TiledRange& split_trange,
181  const TA::SparsePolicy::shape_type& shape, const std::size_t tile_idx,
182  const std::size_t split_ntiles, const std::size_t tile_size) {
183  TA_ASSERT(split_ntiles == split_trange.tiles_range().volume());
184  TA::Tensor<float> split_tile_norms(split_trange.tiles_range());
185 
186  // map element i to its tile index
187  std::size_t offset = tile_idx * split_ntiles;
188 
189  // note that unlike fusion we cannot compute exact norm of the split tile
190  // to guarantee upper bound we have to multiply the norms by the number of
191  // split tiles in the fused tile; to see why multiplication is necessary think
192  // of a tile obtained by fusing 1 nonzero tile with one or more zero tiles.
193  const auto* split_tile_begin = shape.data().data() + offset;
194  std::transform(split_tile_begin, split_tile_begin + split_ntiles,
195  split_tile_norms.data(),
196  [tile_size](const float& elem) { return elem * tile_size; });
197 
198  auto split_shape =
199  TA::SparseShape<float>(split_tile_norms, split_trange, true);
200  return split_shape;
201 }
202 
205 
211 inline TA::DenseShape subshape_from_fused_tile(
212  const TA::TiledRange& split_trange,
213  const TA::DensePolicy::shape_type& shape, const std::size_t tile_idx,
214  const std::size_t split_ntiles, const std::size_t tile_size) {
215  return TA::DenseShape(tile_size, split_trange);
216 }

219 namespace detail {
222 template <typename Array>
223 class dist_subarray_vec
224  : public madness::WorldObject<dist_subarray_vec<Array>> {
225  public:
226  using Tile = typename Array::value_type;
227  using Policy = typename Array::policy_type;
228 
234  dist_subarray_vec(madness::World& world, const std::vector<Array>& array,
235  const std::size_t rank)
236  : madness::WorldObject<dist_subarray_vec<Array>>(world),
237  split_array(array),
238  rank_(rank) {
239  this->process_pending();
240  }
241 
242  virtual ~dist_subarray_vec() {}
243 
248  template <typename Index>
249  madness::Future<Tile> get_tile(int r, Index& i) {
250  return split_array.at(r).find(i);
251  }
252 
254  const std::vector<Array>& array_accessor() const { return split_array; }
255 
257  unsigned long size() const { return rank_; }
258 
259  private:
260  const std::vector<Array>& split_array;
261  const int rank_;
262 };
263 } // namespace detail

267 
287 template <typename Tile, typename Policy>
288 TA::DistArray<Tile, Policy> fuse_vector_of_arrays_tiles(
289  madness::World& global_world,
290  const std::vector<TA::DistArray<Tile, Policy>>& array_vec,
291  const std::size_t fused_dim_extent,
292  const TiledArray::TiledRange& array_trange, std::size_t block_size = 1) {
293  auto nproc = global_world.size();
294 
295  // make instances of array_vec globally accessible
296  using Array = TA::DistArray<Tile, Policy>;
297  detail::dist_subarray_vec<Array> arrays(global_world, array_vec,
298  fused_dim_extent);
299 
300  // make fused tiledrange
301  auto fused_trange =
302  detail::prepend_dim_to_trange(fused_dim_extent, array_trange, block_size);
303  std::size_t ntiles_per_array = array_trange.tiles_range().volume();
304 
305  // make fused shape
306  auto fused_shape = detail::fuse_vector_of_shapes_tiles(
307  global_world, arrays.array_accessor(), fused_dim_extent, fused_trange);
308 
309  // make fused array
310  TA::DistArray<Tile, Policy> fused_array(global_world, fused_trange,
311  fused_shape);
312 
314  auto make_tile = [](const TA::Range& range,
315  const std::vector<madness::Future<Tile>>& tiles) {
316  TA_ASSERT(range.extent(0) == tiles.size());
317  Tile result(range);
318  const auto volume = range.volume();
319  size_t result_volume = 0;
320  auto* result_ptr = result.data();
321  for (auto&& fut_of_tile : tiles) {
322  TA_ASSERT(fut_of_tile.probe());
323  const auto& tile = fut_of_tile.get();
324  const auto* tile_data = tile.data();
325  const auto tile_volume = tile.size();
326  std::copy(tile_data, tile_data + tile_volume, result_ptr);
327  result_ptr += tile_volume;
328  result_volume += tile_volume;
329  }
330  TA_ASSERT(volume == result_volume);
331  return result;
332  };
333 
335  for (auto&& fused_tile_ord : *fused_array.pmap()) {
336  if (!fused_array.is_zero(fused_tile_ord)) {
337  // convert ordinal of the fused tile to the ordinals of its constituent
338  // tiles
339  const auto div0 = std::ldiv(fused_tile_ord, ntiles_per_array);
340  // index of the 0th mode of this tile
341  const auto tile_idx_mode0 = div0.quot;
342  // ordinal of the corresponding tile in the unfused array
343  const auto tile_ord_array = div0.rem;
344 
345  const auto div1 = std::ldiv(tile_idx_mode0, nproc);
346  const auto tile_idx_on_owner = div1.quot;
347  const auto vector_idx_offset_on_owner = tile_idx_on_owner * block_size;
348  const auto owner_rank = div1.rem;
349 
350  auto fused_tile_range =
351  fused_array.trange().make_tile_range(fused_tile_ord);
352  // make a vector of Futures to the input tiles
353  std::vector<madness::Future<Tile>> input_tiles;
354  input_tiles.reserve(fused_tile_range.extent(0));
355  for (size_t v = 0, vidx = tile_idx_mode0 * block_size;
356  v != block_size && vidx < fused_dim_extent; ++v, ++vidx) {
357  using Index = decltype(tile_ord_array);
358  input_tiles.emplace_back(
359  arrays.task(owner_rank,
360  &detail::dist_subarray_vec<
361  DistArray<Tile, Policy>>::template get_tile<Index>,
362  vector_idx_offset_on_owner + v, tile_ord_array));
363  }
364  fused_array.set(
365  fused_tile_ord,
366  global_world.taskq.add(make_tile, std::move(fused_tile_range),
367  std::move(input_tiles)));
368  }
369  }
370 
371  // keep arrays around until everyone is done
372  global_world.gop.fence();
373 
374  return fused_array;
375 }
376 
379 
391 template <typename Tile, typename Policy>
392 void subarray_from_fused_array(
393  madness::World& local_world, const TA::DistArray<Tile, Policy>& fused_array,
394  std::size_t tile_idx,
395  std::vector<TA::DistArray<Tile, Policy>>& split_arrays,
396  const TA::TiledRange& split_trange) {
397  TA_ASSERT(tile_idx < fused_array.trange().dim(0).extent());
398  auto arrays_size = split_arrays.size();
399 
400  // calculate the number of elements in the 0th dimension are in this tile
401  auto tile_range = fused_array.trange().dim(0).tile(tile_idx);
402  auto tile_size = tile_range.second - tile_range.first;
403  std::size_t split_ntiles = split_trange.tiles_range().volume();
404  auto& shape = fused_array.shape();
405 
406  // Create tile_size arrays and put them into split_arrays
407  for (size_t i = tile_range.first; i < tile_range.second; ++i) {
408  auto split_shape = detail::subshape_from_fused_tile(
409  split_trange, shape, tile_idx, split_ntiles, tile_size);
410  // create split Array object
411  TA::DistArray<Tile, Policy> split_array(local_world, split_trange,
412  split_shape);
413  split_arrays.push_back(split_array);
414  }
415 
417  auto make_tile = [](const TA::Range& range, const Tile& fused_tile,
418  const size_t i_offset_in_tile) {
419  const auto split_tile_volume = range.volume();
420  return Tile(range,
421  fused_tile.data() + i_offset_in_tile * split_tile_volume);
422  };
423 
425  auto split_array_ptr = split_arrays.data();
426  for (std::size_t index : *(*split_array_ptr).pmap()) {
427  std::size_t fused_array_index = tile_idx * split_ntiles + index;
428  if (!fused_array.is_zero(fused_array_index)) {
429  for (std::size_t i = tile_range.first, tile_count = 0;
430  i < tile_range.second; ++i, ++tile_count) {
431  auto& array = *(split_array_ptr + arrays_size + tile_count);
432  array.set(index, local_world.taskq.add(
433  make_tile, array.trange().make_tile_range(index),
434  fused_array.find(fused_array_index), tile_count));
435  }
436  }
437  }
438  return;
439 }
